00012 /* quite clear: */
00013 #define SYS_COMPILER_NAME "GNU-C 2.7.1 with libgrx 2.00beta"
00014 /* if your compiler has problems with reserving more then 64K with the
00015    normal alloc */
00016 #define MALLOC(a) malloc(a)
00017 #define REALLOC(a, b) realloc(a, b)
00018 #define FREE(b) (free(b), b = NULL)
00019 #define CALLOC(a, b) calloc(a, b)

00022 /* this is the highest bit used in enum kbstat */
00023 #define MAX_KBSTAT 6
00024 /* the event definitions */
00025     struct ws_event {
00026         enum flagtypes {
00027             ws_f_none, ws_f_lbutton, ws_f_rbutton, ws_f_keypress
00028         } flags;
00029         int x, y; /* coordinates of mouse */
00030         enum buttontypes {
00031             ws_bt_none = 0, ws_bt_left = 1, ws_bt_right = 2
00032         } buttons;
00033         /* button state */
00034         int key; /* key code from keyboard */
00035         enum kbstattypes {
00036             ws_ks_shift = 1, ws_ks_alt = 2, ws_ks_ctrl = 4, ws_ks_numlock = 8,
00037             ws_ks_capslock = 16, ws_ks_scrollock = 32
00038         } kbstat;
00039     };

00041     struct ws_bitmap {
00042         int xpos, ypos, xsize, ysize; /* where it comes from */
00043         struct wi_window *w; /* Pointer to the Window over this bitmap */
00044         void *bitmap; /* Pointer to whatever you need for saving a bitmap */
00045     };
